SEARCH

Class Student

java.lang.Object
Student
public class Student extends Object
The Student class represents a student with a name, password, year of study, faculty, specialization, a list of courses, and a map of grades for each course.

  • Constructor Summary

      faculty - The faculty in which the student is enrolled.
      specialization - The specialization of the student.
      courses - The list of courses the student is enrolled in.
      grades - The map of grades for each course.
